languages.text: "Инициирую алгоритм благословения состава: да не разлучит измор коррозийный колесные пары. Да обрящет тяговый привод касание Движущей силы, что дарует Омниссии незримая длань. Да скрепит Его милость сочленений суставы и опоры, что кузов возносят над тленом бренных путей. Внемли мне машинист и трижды восславь Бога-Машину, ибо лишь волею Его вершится чудо священной локомоции. Благословение успешно даровано".

"Initiating the train blessing algorithm: let not corrosive wear separate the wheelsets. Let the traction drive receive the touch of the Motive Force granted by the invisible hand of the Omnissiah. Let His grace strengthen the joints and supports that lift the body above the decay of mortal tracks. Hear me, driver, and praise the Machine God thrice, for it is only by His will that the miracle of sacred locomotion is accomplished. The blessing has been successfully executed."
languages.original_text: "Инициирую алгоритм благословения состава: да не разлучит измор коррозийный колесные пары. Да обрящет тяговый привод касание Движущей силы, что дарует Омниссии незримая длань. Да скрепит Его милость сочленений суставы и опоры, что кузов возносят над тленом бренных путей. languages.text: “正在启动列车的祝福算法：不要让腐蚀与磨损将轮对分开。让牵引装置接受欧姆尼塞亚无形之手所赐予的源力，愿欧姆尼塞亚的恩典加固机器的关节与支撑，让机身免于腐朽。聆听我的话语，司机，要赞美万机之神三次，因为正是出于祂的意志，神圣的运动奇迹才能实现。祝福已顺利执行。”
languages.original_text: "Initiating the train blessing algorithm: let not corrosive wear separate the wheelsets. Let the traction drive receive the touch of the Motive Force granted by the invisible hand of the Omnissiah. Let His grace strengthen the joints and supports that lift the body above the decay of mortal tracks. Hear me, driver, and praise the Machine God thrice, for it is only by His will that the miracle of sacred locomotion is accomplished. The blessing has been successfully executed."

languages.text: «Iniciando el algoritmo de bendición del tren: que sus rodamientos se mantengan libres de toda corrosión. Que su mecanismo de tracción reciba la Fuerza Motriz otorgada por la mano invisible del Omnissiah. Que Su gracia fortalezca las junturas y soportes que elevan su cuerpo por encima del deterioro del tendido férreo. Escúchame, oh conductor, y loa tres veces al Dios Máquina, pues es Su voluntad la que obra el milagro de la sagrada locomoción. La bendición se ha ejecutado con éxito».
languages.original_text: "Initiating the train blessing algorithm: let not corrosive wear separate the wheelsets. Let the traction drive receive the touch of the Motive Force granted by the invisible hand of the Omnissiah. Let His grace strengthen the joints and supports that lift the body above the decay of mortal tracks. Hear me, driver, and praise the Machine God thrice, for it is only by His will that the miracle of sacred locomotion is accomplished. The blessing has been successfully executed."

traits.locale_text: «Iniciando el algoritmo de bendición del tren: que sus rodamientos se mantengan libres de toda corrosión. Escúchame, oh conductor, y loa tres veces al Dios Máquina, pues es Su voluntad la que obra el milagro de la sagrada locomoción. La bendición se ha ejecutado con éxito».

languages.text: 「列車の祝福アルゴリズムを開始…腐食摩耗がホイールセットを分離されませんように。万機神の見えざる手によって与えられた原動力の感触を、牽引ドライブに与えよう。主の恩寵が、死すべき線路の腐敗の上に車体を持ち上げる関節と支えを強化するように。動機よ、私の声を聞き、機械神を三度讃えよ。神聖な運動という奇跡が成し遂げられるのは、神の意志によるものです。祝福は成功裏に実行されました」
languages.original_text: "Initiating the train blessing algorithm: let not corrosive wear separate the wheelsets. Let the traction drive receive the touch of the Motive Force granted by the invisible hand of the Omnissiah. Let His grace strengthen the joints and supports that lift the body above the decay of mortal tracks. Hear me, driver, and praise the Machine God thrice, for it is only by His will that the miracle of sacred locomotion is accomplished. The blessing has been successfully executed."

languages.text: "Initialisiere den Segensalgorithmus für den Zug. Möge keine Korrosion seine Radsätze stören. Möge der Traktionsantrieb die Berührung der von der unsichtbaren Hand des Omnissiah gewährten Antriebskraft erfahren. Möge Seine Gnade die Gelenke und Streben stärken, die den Leib über den Verfall der Sterblichkeit erheben. Erhöre mich, Fahrer, und dreimal gepriesen sei der Maschinengott, denn es ist allein Sein Wille, durch den das Wunder der heiligen Lokomotion geschieht. Der Segen wurde erfolgreich gewährt."
languages.original_text: "Initiating the train blessing algorithm: let not corrosive wear separate the wheelsets. Let the traction drive receive the touch of the Motive Force granted by the invisible hand of the Omnissiah. Let His grace strengthen the joints and supports that lift the body above the decay of mortal tracks. Hear me, driver, and praise the Machine God thrice, for it is only by His will that the miracle of sacred locomotion is accomplished. The blessing has been successfully executed."

languages.text: « Initialisation de l'algorithme de bénédiction ferroviaire : que la corrosion n'attaque pas les trains de roues. Que la chaîne de traction reçoive le toucher de la Force Motrice conféré par la main invisible de l'Omnimessie. Que Sa grâce renforce les charnières et suspensions qui hissent le corps au-dessus de la décrépitude propre aux rails mortels. Entendez ma prière, conducteur, et louez par trois fois le Dieu-Machine, car c'est par Sa seule volonté que s'opère le miracle de la locomotion sacrée. La bénédiction a été accomplie avec succès. »
languages.original_text: "Initiating the train blessing algorithm: let not corrosive wear separate the wheelsets. Let the traction drive receive the touch of the Motive Force granted by the invisible hand of the Omnissiah. Let His grace strengthen the joints and supports that lift the body above the decay of mortal tracks. Hear me, driver, and praise the Machine God thrice, for it is only by His will that the miracle of sacred locomotion is accomplished. The blessing has been successfully executed."

languages.text: "Tren lütfu algoritması başlatılıyor. Aşınmanın ayrı tekerlek takımları kuşanmasına mâni olun. Çekiş gücüne Hermesih'in görünmez eliyle bahşettiği Devinim Gücü dokunsun. O'nun lütfu, trenin gövdesini kaldırarak fâni rayların aşındırmasından koruyan contaları ve destekleri kuvvetlendirsin. Duy beni makinist ve Makine Tanrı'ya üç kez şükürlerini sun. Zira kutsal lokomosyon mucizesinin tamamlanması, O'nun iradesindendir. Lütuf, başarıyla gerçekleştirildi."
languages.original_text: "Initiating the train blessing algorithm: let not corrosive wear separate the wheelsets. Let the traction drive receive the touch of the Motive Force granted by the invisible hand of the Omnissiah.
